ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: if they want to do total synthesis yes, they will need it. if not, no
Absolutely, best course I've taken here.

The class requires a lot of work, especially if synthesis knowledge is not very strong. However, I think it's a must take class to advance synthesis knowledge and learn to look at compounds and propose syntheses. I would recommend taking this class.
hard but very useful. absolute crash course.
I would definitely recommend this class to any student looking to do total synthesis for a graduate career. The class is very well-structured, and exams are fair.
Yes, although the class is challenging, it forces the student to grow and learn.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Greatly helped my understanding of retrosynthesis, as well as adding to the methodology toolbox.
This class really helped improve my knowledge of synthetic reactions and being able to apply reactions to forward syntheses for natural products.
very appropriate for me! so helpful, definitely caught me up real fast
This course is a great representation of what a graduate course should be. Many of the reactions covered in the class will be helpful throughout my graduate career.
